main event: An airline pilot reported an unidentified object while flying from Amarillo to El Paso, Texas, on July 6, 1957.
interesting points: The pilot reported that the object circled the airplane and accelerated away at an estimated speed of 3,000 mph., The object was estimated to be 50 to 75 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for 3 minutes., ATIC's opinion was that the object was probably a conventional aircraft as confirmed by radar., The pilot requested a chase but was denied by authorities.
